授業目的: The purpose of this class is for students to understand why US economy has been innovative.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the followings: (1) what is a proper corporate strategy to create innovation, (2) what is a proper role for universities to help corporate innovation, (3) whether or not competition policy has been helpful for innovation, and (4) whether or not strong patent protection is beneficial for innovation.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

関連科目: By using basic knowledge of economics and management, students study an economic aspect of the US.  This class allows students to obtain "the capability to understand and analyze the problems of international affairs," and "the capability of find and solve problems."
授業の概要・背景: Because innovation is a critical source of econoimc growth, it is important for citizens of any nations to understand why the US has successfully created innovation.
